MIME media type name : Application

MIME subtype name : Vendor Tree - vnd.ms-officetheme

Required parameters : N/A

Optional parameters :
N/A


Encoding considerations : 8bit
This media type may require encoding on transports not capable of
handling 8 bit text.

Security considerations :
The security considerations for this type have not been assessed.


Interoperability considerations :
There are no known interoperability considerations for this type.


Published specification :
N/A


Applications which use this media :
Microsoft Office


Additional information :

1. Magic number(s) : N/A
2. File extension(s) : .thmx
3. Macintosh file type code : N/A
4. Object Identifiers: N/A


Person to contact for further information :

1. Name : Chris Rae
2. Email : chris.rae&microsoft.com

Intended usage : Common
This type will be used to represent Microsoft Office themes.


Author/Change controller : Chris Rae / Microsoft Corporation
